short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension removes some Ads on Youtube, X(Twitter) and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You SHOULD NOT use this extension. It is designed solely for my own personal use.

X ( Twitter ):
- This extension has NOT been verified to operate on 'X Premium (Twitter Blue)'.
- ABSOLUTELY removes Ads
- removes recommended content
- reduces tracking information
- simplifies UI ( no Highlights, Superfollows, Subscriptions, Banners )
- allows quick user blocking ( auto-approve )
- tab navigation via swiping

Youtube:
- This extension has NOT been verified to operate on 'Youtube Premium'.
- ABSOLUTELY removes Ads
- removes recommended content
- reduces tracking information
- simplifies UI ( simple Menu, no Shorts )

## EXPERIMENTAL FEATURE ##
Spotify:
- This extension has NOT been verified to operate on 'Spotify Premium'.
- reduces audio ad duration to less than a second
- reduces tracking information
- removes recommended content ( only on Desktop Web Spotify )
- NO plans to optimize for the mobile version of Spotify

more:
- blocks certain Ad networks ( only in Japan )
- works with Manifest V3
- no settings, customization not possible.
